package.name: h4x0r
package.description: An Adium chat style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long:
Author: "Hopefully it will make you feel all l33t and remind you of that exciting feeling you used to get when that BBS you loved finally gave you a carrier after getting a busy signal for hours. Have phun l4m3rz!"
This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=1907
